analysis.description: NatminToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x4afea0f1252335e5e6be870139de87725e16560b.sol#184-189) is declared view but contains assembly code

	External calls:
	- _tokenReceiver.tokenFallback(msg.sender,_value,_data) (/unique_contracts/0x4afea0f1252335e5e6be870139de87725e16560b.sol#201-202)

	- balances (/unique_contracts/0x4afea0f1252335e5e6be870139de87725e16560b.sol#206)

_empty in NatminToken._burn (/unique_contracts/0x4afea0f1252335e5e6be870139de87725e16560b.sol#276) is a local variable never initialiazed
